content:
Russian troops tried to go to Ivanovsk in small groups to Ivanovsk west of Bakhmut, but were destroyed.

Appropriate videooutlined on the evening of March 26The General Staff of the Armed Forces.

Fire on the occupiers was fighters of the 1st Mechanized Battalion of the Presidential Brigade and 80 separate landing and assault brigade. There were machine-made automatic grenade launchers, mortars and FPVs.

Asreported the armyinform, The forces of defense destroyed three shelters and armored vehicles of the enemy.
title: The General Staff showed hunting in the hostile infantry in Ivanovo
description: The corresponding video was posted on the evening of March 26, the General Staff of the Armed Forces. Fire on ...
author: Army Inform
